svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_4) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.169 Safari/537.36" version="7.5.1" editor="www.draw.io" type="atlas"><mxAtlasLibraries/><diagram id="c68ae7fe-486d-9028-9b29-661cf2167265" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 136px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 136px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 230px; max-width: 180px; width: 180px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.b: Use market tools to generate platform-native resource files

div.div: May include tools like kontemplate, helm, kops, troposphere etc.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 130px; max-width: 180px; width: 180px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: A sequence of optional, specialised steps

switch.text:
Drone Build

A sequence of optional, specialised steps

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 160px; max-width: 180px; width: 180px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.b: Send the deployment specification payload to the Slingshot API

div.div: Inputs: slingshot yml and native platform templates (cloudformation, k8s)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 136px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 160px; max-width: 180px; width: 180px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.b: Allows users to specify their Slingshot pipelines in a higher level language

div.div: Inputs: slingshot DSL (e.g. based on Typescript)
